summary: Completed comprehensive testing of 4 new major features for umiri.me: Breathing Exercise, Gratitude Journal, Weekly AI Report, and Dark Mode. All features tested successfully with 100% pass rate on both backend (24/24 tests) and frontend integration tests.
passed_tests: POST /api/moods accepts and stores gratitude field correctly
POST /api/ai/weekly-report generates comprehensive AI weekly analysis
GET /api/moods returns entries with gratitude field populated
Mood entry page displays gratitude input with correct Serbian label 'Za šta si danas zahvalan/na?'
Negative moods (tuzan, anksiozan, ljut) trigger breathing exercise suggestion
Breathing exercise modal opens with 'Započni' button click
Breathing exercise has functional start/stop/close controls and 60s timer
Weekly Report page loads at /weekly-report route
Generate Weekly Report button produces AI-powered mood analysis
Dark mode toggle in sidebar successfully switches between light/dark themes
End-to-end mood saving with gratitude field works correctly
Trial user has premium access to weekly report feature (6 days remaining)
All existing functionality (mood tracking, triggers, premium features) remain intact
